title: Project, 1920–30
medium: Pencil, dark purple watercolor, white heightening, cardboard with gray obverse (split)
description: Vertical rectangle. In Gothic style. Hexagonal plan. Inscription at the base. Gem-studded knob. The broad front panel shows the monogram: I h s. Laterally, standing in niches, are St. peter and St. Paul. Pyramidical cover topped by a cross.

tombstone.epitaph: Project, 1920–30.Pencil, dark purple watercolor, white heightening, cardboard with gray obverse (split). 1939-84-94-a.
